sentences.en: A lot of crops were damaged by the frost.
sentences.cn: 这次霜冻,受害的庄稼不少.

sentences.en: According to the weather forecast, frost is expected tomorrow morning.
sentences.cn: 据气象预报, 明晨将有霜冻.

sentences.en: Braving snow and frost , the plum trees blossomed defiantly.
Citrus growers were cautioned to protect the fruit from frost.
sentences.cn: 种柑橘者受到防霜保橘的劝告.

sentences.en: Fill the cooling system with antifreeze as a protection against frost.
sentences.cn: 在冷却系统里加防冻剂以防止霜冻.

sentences.en: It will be a clear night with some ground frost .
sentences.cn: 今夜晴，部分地面有霜冻。

sentences.en: Jack Frost was threatening to kill the new plants.
sentences.cn: 霜降危及新作物的存活。

sentences.en: She was frosting the cupcakes while we talked.
sentences.cn: 我们交谈时，她在给杯形蛋糕撒糖霜。

sentences.en: The air was thin and crisp, filled with hazy sunshine and frost.
sentences.cn: 空气稀薄清新，其间日光蒙眬，寒气逼人。

sentences.en: The crops were not touched by the early frost.
The frost did much damage to the crops.
sentences.cn: 霜冻使农作物受到很大的损害.

sentences.en: The frost has blighted my crops.
sentences.cn: 霜冻使我的庄稼枯萎了.

sentences.en: The frost last week was a great calamity to the citrus industry.
sentences.cn: 上周的霜冻对柑橘种植业是一场大灾难.

sentences.en: The grass and trees were white with frost.
sentences.cn: 例句： 草上和树上结了一层白霜。

sentences.en: the risk of frost damage to crops
sentences.cn: 庄稼遭受霜冻灾害的危险

sentences.en: The towering pine and cypress trees defy frost and snow.
These seedlings were killed off by the severe frost.
sentences.cn: 这些幼苗由于严霜而冻死了。

sentences.en: We had 11 degrees of frost last night.
sentences.cn: 昨天夜里气温降到了零下11度。
